mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Legacy Dancer Survey, 1983", "How Angelic Are Our Angels?", "Dropouts - An In-depth Analysis", "Vox Saltatoris: The Square Dancer Speaks Up", "The Silver Spur Award", "Square Dance Foundation of New England", "National Convention" and "The 1983-84 Directory." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Mostly Modular", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Contra Corner", "Experimental Notes", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "On The Record", "Caller of the Month", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
